  "special_power_descriptions": {
    "Shoot First": "Deal 3x damage against unengaged targets (first shot in combat)",
    "Double Shot": "Fire 2x damage at 2x energy cost (only when energy gauge is full)",
    "Execute": "Deal 5x damage vs targets below 30% HP",
    "Armor Piercing": "+50% damage vs armored targets",
    "Hunter's Mark": "Next shot guaranteed critical hit",
    "Suppressive Fire": "Cone attack hitting all targets for 50% damage",
    "Terminator Protocol": "Heal 50% max HP on kill",
    "Perfect Shot": "100% crit chance for 5 seconds (1 use per level)",
    "Reverse Polarity": "Slice enemy spawners to spawn allies instead",
    "Scrapyard Droideka": "Build Droideka ally from 10 wire (max 1, doesn't count as ally slot)",
    "Overcharge": "Double energy regen for 10 seconds",
    "Energy Vampire": "Steal 20 energy from hit targets",
    "Turret Deployment": "Deploy stationary turret (costs 30 wire)",
    "Shield Generator": "Temporary invulnerability (costs 50 wire)",
    "Master Slicer": "Slice NPCs to become allies (ignores normal recruitment rules)",
    "Chain Lightning": "Damage jumps between nearby targets",
    "Translator": "Recruit non-Basic speaking aliens",
    "Etiquette Protocol": "+20% faction relationship gains from all actions",
    "Rally Cry": "All allies gain +50% damage for 10 seconds",
    "Inspiring Presence": "Allies regenerate HP slowly over time",
    "...(more keys)": "13 additional properties"
  }
}
